page.title: 06Local and National Officers
page.content: Member of Parliament {Mr.Antony Steen County Councillor {Mr.Arnold Sayers South Hams Dist.Cllr.{Mr.Richard Yonge Parish Council {Mrs J.Mears (Chairman) 10 Members {Mr.R.Yonge (Vice-Chmn) { Mrs B.Best Dr.M.Everitt { Mrs R.Holbrook Mr W.Dennis { Mr A.Young Mr G.Perry { Mr K.Marshall Mr J.Cross The Parish Council meets on the 4th Monday in the month at 7.30pm usually in the Health Centre. Councillors are elected to serve for 4 years. The Parish Council make observations on planning, inspect the footpaths and bring to the attention of South Hams matters of local importance. The Community Constable PC Graham Williams attends meetings. He also patrols Brixton and Wembury.The police Station which serves Yealmpton is Plymstock 8am - midnight, therafter Plympton.
